title: The Music album: songs of the west
brief_description: Country and western music performed by Carson Robinson and his Buckaroos, Dick Thomas and Gus Van to a backdrop of horse mustering and log cabins. Includes ‘Where the mountains meet the sky’ and ‘I’m an old cowhand’
